channel.title: Comments on: Lynda asks, “Why do apps I delete keep reappearing?”
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: Cici
item.dc:creator: Cici
item.description: The same crappy apps keep coming back, but I don't even have a laptop. Every time I delete the apps and turn my device off, then on, I discover that the apps are there again
item.content:encoded: The same crappy apps keep coming back, but I don’t even have a laptop. Every time I delete the apps and turn my device off, then on, I discover that the apps are there again
